SELECT t1.* FROM crm_after_sale_store_allot t1 WHERE t1.enabled=1
AND t1.from_store_id in( select depot.id FROM crm_depot depot where depot.enabled=1 and depot.name like concat('%',#{p.fromStoreName},'%') )
AND t1.to_store_id in( select depot.id FROM crm_depot depot where depot.enabled=1 and depot.name like concat('%',#{p.toStoreName},'%') )
and t1.created_date >= #{p.createdDateStart}
and t1.created_date <= #{p.createdDateEnd}
and t1.created_by in( select id from hr_account where login_name like concat('%',#{p.createdBy},'%') and enabled=1 )
and t1.product_id in( select product.id from crm_product product where product.name like concat('%',#{p.productName},'%') and product.enabled=1 )
and t1.product_id in( select id from crm_product_ime where ime like concat('%',#{p.badProductIme},'%') and enabled=1 )
and t1.out_code like concat('%',#{p.outCode},'%')
and t1.after_sale_id like concat('%',#{p.afterSaleId},'%')
